quote_last:
, my lord,” the bodyguard reported.
“Ah, good. Still time.” He walked over to a group of pillows in the far corner of the room, and I realized that they had been strewn around a little raised platform of stone.
title: Blood Rites
author: Jim Butcher

quote_first: There’s a whisper down the line at
quote_last: When the Night Mail’s ready to depart, Saying “Skimble where is Skimble has he gone to hunt the thimble? We must find him or the train can’t start.”
title: Old Possum's Book of Practical Cats
author: T.S. Eliot
